post:
Hello all! 

[VPSBiT.com](http://vpsbit.com) is offer a limited stock special offer from Hong Kong.

- 1vCPU (3GHz)  
- 512MB RAM  
- 350GB Disk Space  
- 1IPv4 Address  
- 3TB Data Transfer on 100Mbit Port  
- Server Location: Hong Kong  
- $7 /month (BitCoin/CarrotPay ONLY for our Special Offer Server)  

Please note that our service may only be used for legal purposes. SPAM and Copyright infringement are strictly prohibited and will result in immediate termination without refund.

For this particular plan, we are only accept via CarrotPay (which basically means BitCoin or Bank Transfer). Please do not ask for Paypal payment. If you wish to pay with Paypal, please consider out other plans, which we will accept PP for.

The server may be used as a VPN if you wish, but please note that there is NO DIRECT ROUTE TO CHINA. For China, you may expect latency to be above 200ms. You can still expect low latency to Hong Kong (<10ms), Singapore (<30ms) and Japan (<50ms) and so on.

Server is intended to be self-managed and without a backup facility. Please take care to keep your own backups.

Order Form: http://my.vpsbit.com/order/main/packages/SpecialOffers/?group_id=12

Please feel free to ask any questions.
